name: Apple Archery - I Shooter 3D
description:
Join this farmer shooting contest! Tense the string with sufficient strength, make allowances for the wind and hit the target! Be the champion of Apple Archery I Shooter 3D!

Hit all the targets on the humans head and become a winner of this exciting archery tournament. Ask your assistants for help – they’ll hold apples for you to shoot them. Try not to hit their heads or bodies.

Choose the bow or crossbow to shoot the target on the head of a brave assistances. Improve your archery and aiming skills and try not to kill them. Your arrows have to hit all apples with high accuracy!

Gain uneasy experience to become the real archery master. Be accurately and patiently as a real archer, but don’t give up after misses. Just tense your bow, aim the apple on the man's head, get the best results and hit the target with the arrow! Complete different missions, surpass other participants and become a champion!

Earn points to unlock new bows and crossbows! Try traditional longbow, composite bow or even self-bow, compel their qualities and choose the best for each type of missions. Raise up your archery skills, aim targets as a real bowmaster and try not to his your assistance! Hit the targets on time to achieve the highest results! Good luck!

Have you ever dreamed of fame of such famous archers like Oliver Queen, Robin Hood, Katniss Everdeen, Kim Woo-jin or Bard The Bowman? Feel the pride of your accuracy playing Apple Archery I Shooter 3D!

Apple Archery I Shooter 3D features:

Ultimate archery tournament for the rednecks and farmers
Different missions to train your aiming and shooting skills
Funny graphics for full impression
Great trainer for your accuracy
Several kinds of bow and crossbow
Try to be as accurate as possible and get the highest score playing Feel the pride of your accuracy playing Apple Archery I Shooter 3D!
